mapper.select: SELECT ORDER_NO, PACKAGE_NAME, PACKAGE_IMG, PACKAGE_TYPE, ORDER_DATE, ORDER_ADDRESS,ORDER_NAME,ORDER_TEL,ORDER_PRICE,ORDER_DEL_FL FROM "ORDER" LEFT JOIN ORDER_MENU USING (ORDER_NO) LEFT JOIN ORDER_MENU_OPTION USING (ORDER_MENU_NO) JOIN "PACKAGE" USING (PACKAGE_NO) LEFT JOIN "OPTION" USING (OPTION_NO) LEFT JOIN "DELIVERY" USING (ORDER_NO) LEFT JOIN "MENU" USING(MENU_NO) WHERE NOT ORDER_DEL_FL='A' AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} GROUP BY ORDER_NO,PACKAGE_NAME,PACKAGE_IMG,PACKAGE_TYPE, ORDER_DATE, ORDER_ADDRESS,ORDER_NAME,ORDER_TEL,ORDER_PRICE,ORDER_DEL_FL ORDER BY ORDER_NO DESC

SELECT DISTINCT ORDER_MENU_NO, MENU_NO, MENU_NAME, MENU_PRICE, MENU_IMG FROM "ORDER" LEFT JOIN ORDER_MENU USING (ORDER_NO) LEFT JOIN ORDER_MENU_OPTION USING (ORDER_MENU_NO) LEFT JOIN "MENU" USING (MENU_NO) WHERE NOT ORDER_DEL_FL='A' AND ORDER_NO=#{orderNo} AND MENU_DEL_FL='N' ORDER BY ORDER_MENU_NO

SELECT OPTION_NO, OPTION_NAME, OPTION_COUNT, OPTION_PRICE FROM "ORDER" LEFT JOIN ORDER_MENU USING (ORDER_NO) LEFT JOIN ORDER_MENU_OPTION USING (ORDER_MENU_NO) LEFT JOIN "PACKAGE" USING (PACKAGE_NO) JOIN "OPTION" USING (OPTION_NO) LEFT JOIN "MENU" USING (MENU_NO) LEFT JOIN "REVIEW" USING(ORDER_MENU_NO) WHERE NOT ORDER_DEL_FL='A' AND ORDER_MENU_NO=#{orderMenuNo} AND MENU_DEL_FL='N' ORDER BY OPTION_NO

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY ORDER_NO ORDER BY ORDER_NO, DELIVERY_DATE) ROW_NUM, DELIVERY_NO, DELIVERY_CODE, DELIVERY_STATUS, TO_CHAR(DELIVERY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') DELIVERY_DATE, ORDER_NO FROM "ORDER" LEFT JOIN ORDER_MENU USING (ORDER_NO) LEFT JOIN ORDER_MENU_OPTION USING (ORDER_MENU_NO) JOIN "PACKAGE" USING (PACKAGE_NO) LEFT JOIN "OPTION" USING (OPTION_NO) LEFT JOIN "DELIVERY" USING (ORDER_NO) LEFT JOIN "MENU" USING(MENU_NO) LEFT JOIN "DELIVERY_MANAGE" USING(DELIVERY_CODE) WHERE NOT ORDER_DEL_FL='A' AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} GROUP BY DELIVERY_DATE, DELIVERY_NO, DELIVERY_CODE,ORDER_NO, DELIVERY_STATUS
SELECT NVL2(REVIEW_NO, 'done' ,'possible')REVIEW_CHECK, ORDER_MENU_NO FROM "ORDER_MENU" LEFT JOIN REVIEW USING(ORDER_MENU_NO) JOIN "ORDER" USING(ORDER_NO) ORDER BY ORDER_MENU_NO
